name: daily-meeting-memory
description: Track meeting notes, project context, and task assignments across sessions using IRIS agent memory. Your AI agent remembers what was discussed and follows up on action items.

functions.name: store_meeting_notes
functions.description: Store meeting notes and decisions as agent memory

agent_id.description: The agent ID to store memory for

functions.example: iris sdk:call memory.store agent_id=11 type=context content="Discussed API redesign" topic=daily_standup

functions.name: search_previous_context
functions.description: Recall what was discussed in previous meetings

query.description: Search term to find relevant memories

functions.example: iris sdk:call memory.search agent_id=11 query="project status"

functions.name: assign_task
functions.description: Store a task assignment in agent memory for tracking
functions.example: iris sdk:call memory.store agent_id=11 type=fact content="TODO: Draft spec by Friday" topic=tasks importance=9

functions.name: recall_project_status
functions.description: Get the latest project status from agent memory
functions.example: iris sdk:call memory.list agent_id=11 topic=project_status memory_type=context

examples.title: Daily Standup Workflow
examples.description: Complete daily meeting flow: recall context, add notes, assign tasks
steps: iris sdk:call memory.search agent_id=11 query="yesterday standup"
iris sdk:call memory.store agent_id=11 type=context content="Sprint review: 8/10 tickets complete" topic=daily_standup
iris sdk:call memory.store agent_id=11 type=fact content="TODO: Fix auth bug by EOD" topic=tasks importance=9

examples.title: Weekly Review
examples.description: Search all meeting notes from the past week
steps: iris sdk:call memory.search agent_id=11 query="standup meeting"
iris sdk:call memory.list agent_id=11 topic=tasks memory_type=fact

agent_id.description: Agent ID to manage memory for
